_pageTitle.comment: Page title displayed in the browser tab
_requestTagsTitle.comment: List header title for the list of tags

requestTagListColumns._tag.comment: Tag column header label of the list
requestTagListColumns._description.comment: Description column header label of the list
requestTagListColumns._totalUsage.comment: Total uses column header label of the list
requestTagListColumns._numOfServices.comment: Number of services column header label of the list
requestTagListColumns._numOfServiceAnswers.comment: Number of services answers column header label of the list
requestTagListColumns._numOfEngagements.comment: Number of requests for assistance column header label of the list
requestTagListColumns._numOfClients.comment: Number of clients column header label of the list
requestTagListColumns._usageCounts.comment: Usage counts label for mobile view
requestTagListColumns._serviceAnswers.comment: Service Submissions label for mobile view

requestTagListRowActions._edit.comment: Row action button text for editing a tag

select._placeholder.comment: Placeholder for the category select dropdown

addTag._categoryPlaceholder.comment: Placeholder used when selecting tag category, tag category is stored in common.json

submitMessage.failed: Submit Failed: Unable to create tag
Submit Failed: Unable to save tag
